Description.Details: With the advancements of AMS laser-based technology, this advanced version of the Clan Laser AMS is capable of protecting multiple units within range from missile salvos. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Laser Anti Missile System

Description.Details: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: LAMS

Description.Details: This unique Armor has an Integrated LAMS Prototype, capable to defend its owner and allies from the majority of Missile Attacks made during Battle. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: LAMS

Description.Details: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Clan LAMS

Description.Details: This Armor carries an Integrated Laser Anti Missile, pocketing the mech with many smaller Laser system to grant a improved interception Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Int. LAMS

Description.Details: Where do you get this Crap, Boss? This was a LAMS from a WLF-1X, but they slapped a APDS tracking system in it, hotwired a capacitor into it and jury rigged the lensing system of what looks to be Large Pulse Laser into this..... Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Jury Rigged LAMS

Description.Details: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Laser AMS

Description.Details: This TAG is hardwired to nearby Arrow IV Support carriers and calls in a precision strike
Description.Name: TAG

Description.Details: This TAG was rewired to call on supporting Fire from nearby Artillery to Shell the target with a selection of munitions
Description.Name: TAG

Description.Details: This TAG was rewired to call on supporting Fire from a orbiting Dropship to fire a naval PPC on the target area
Description.Name: TAG

Description.Details: EM Interference reduces sensor efficiency.
Description.Name: SENSORS IMPAIRED

Description.Details: Clan Star Adder developed the Heavy Lasers to deal more damage, but with an increased heat output. In addition, interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Large Laser is penalized with a +1 to-hit modifier.
Description.Name: Heavy L Laser (C)

Description.Details: Clan Star Adder developed the Heavy Lasers to deal more damage, but with an increased heat output. In addition, interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Medium Laser is penalized with a +1 to-hit modifier.
Description.Name: Heavy M Laser (C)

Description.Details: Clan Star Adder developed the Heavy Lasers to deal more damage, but with an increased heat output. In addition, interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Small Laser is penalized with a +1 to-hit modifier.
Description.Name: Heavy S Laser (C)

Description.Details: After the Star Adders introduced their Heavy Lasers, the other Clans started projects to duplicate or improve on them. Clan Goliath Scorpion was the first clan to introduce an effective Improved Heavy Laser, but it still possessed several tradeoffs that some warriors wouldn't accept. Most notable of these, it could explode if it suffered critical damage, much like a Gauss Rifle.
Description.Name: i. Heavy L Laser (C)

Description.Details: After the Star Adders introduced their Heavy Lasers, the other Clans started projects to duplicate or improve on them. Clan Goliath Scorpion was the first clan to introduce an effective Improved Heavy Laser, but it still possessed several tradeoffs that some warriors wouldn't accept. Most notable of these, it could explode if it suffered critical damage, much like a Gauss Rifle.
Description.Name: i. Heavy M Laser (C)

Description.Details: After the Star Adders introduced their Heavy Lasers, the other Clans started projects to duplicate or improve on them. Clan Goliath Scorpion was the first clan to introduce an effective Improved Heavy Laser, but it still possessed several tradeoffs that some warriors wouldn't accept. Most notable of these, it could explode if it suffered critical damage, much like a Gauss Rifle.
Description.Name: i. Heavy S Laser (C)

Description.Details: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Large Ammo.
Description.Name: L Chem Laser

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Extended-Range Large Lasers extend their effective range at the cost of massive heat generation. Like all Lasers, ER Large Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Description.Name: ER L Laser (C)

Description.Details: The technicians of Clan Wolf were interested in creating an improved pulse laser with extended range. Unlike their Inner Sphere counterparts, who simply pumped more energy into a standard pulse laser, the Wolf techs combined the best features of their Pulse and Extended range lasers to create the ER Pulse Laser family.
Description.Name: L ER Pulse (C)

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Large Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with greatly increased heat and weight. Like all Lasers, Large Pulse Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Description.Name: L Pulse Laser (C)

Description.Details: While lost to the Inner Sphere during the devastation of the Succession Wars, the Clans retained the Target Acquisition Gear, but rarely made use of them due to their culture's focus on personal glory rather than supporting roles. Two turn duration, does not stack.
Description.Name: Light TAG (C)

Description.Details: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.
Description.Name: Target Acquired

Description.Details: TAG increases Visibility
Description.Name: Detected

Description.Details: Visual indicator of the TAG effect
Description.Name: TAG MARKED

Description.Details: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Medium Ammo.
Description.Name: M Chem Laser

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Medium Lasers, Extended-Range Medium Lasers extend their effective range at the cost of considerable heat generation.
Description.Name: ER M Laser (C)

Description.Details: The technicians of Clan Wolf were interested in creating an improved pulse laser with extended range. Unlike their Inner Sphere counterparts, who simply pumped more energy into a standard pulse laser, the Wolf techs combined the best features of their Pulse and Extended range lasers to create the ER Pulse Laser family.
Description.Name: M ER Pulse (C)

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Medium Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with increased heat and weight. Like all Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Description.Name: M Pulse Laser (C)

Description.Details: The Extended-Range Micro Laser is a very compact version of conventional ER laser weaponry. This laser weapon was specifically developed by Clan Smoke Jaguar for use on very light combat units,
Description.Name: ER Micro Laser (C)

Description.Details: The Micro Pulse Laser was designed by Clan Smoke Jaguar (alongside the ER Micro Laser) primarily for use on their ProtoMechs. It has since spread to all the Clans.
Description.Name: Micro Pulse Laser (C)

Description.Details: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Small Ammo.
Description.Name: S Chem Laser

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Small Lasers, Extended-Range Small Lasers extend their effective range at the cost of more heat generation. Like all Lasers, ER Small Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Description.Name: ER S Laser (C)

Description.Details: The technicians of Clan Wolf were interested in creating an improved pulse laser with extended range. Unlike their Inner Sphere counterparts, who simply pumped more energy into a standard pulse laser, the Wolf techs combined the best features of their Pulse and Extended range lasers to create the ER Pulse Laser family.
Description.Name: S ER Pulse (C)

Description.Details: An improvement upon standard Small Lasers, Small Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with greatly increased heat and weight. Like all Lasers, Small Pulse Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Description.Name: S Pulse Laser (C)

Description.Details: This 'PAAARTYCANNON' is barely more then 4 Chemical Lasers jury rigged together with a Randomized Focusing Lense to make it change Colours During firing... Someone scratched 'Sta-sta-Staaying Aliive' on it... Uses Chem Medium Ammo.
Description.Name: M Chem Laser

Description.Details: Reduce Heat Damage by 1%
Description.Name: Heat Damage SoftCap

Description.Details: Apparently it wasn't enough to just weld some Medium Chemicals together, they HAD to do the same to Large ones too.... this doesn't smell like Machine Oil either... Uses Chem Large Ammo. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: L Chem Laser

Description.Details: Boss, I'm speechless. I have no idea how it works and the rat's nest of wires and mismatched circuits inside is absolutely horrifying. But this is basically a Streak Laser. If fires a constant low power spotting beam and has sensors to analyze reflections. You can hold down the trigger but it will only discharge when it's pointed at something with armor plating.
Description.Name: L Laser

Description.Details: This unit is coated with burning chemicals.
Description.Name: INFERNO

Description.Details: Whatever this is I don't even know even know where to start, it is as if some Punk heard stories of Heavy Medium Lasers and decided rewiring a PPC Capacitor into a broken down Large Laser does the same..... Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: M H Laser (P)

Description.Details: This is terrible. A pirate finds pulse technology and in an effort to improve it cracks open the focusing chamber and hot-wires the capacitors into a feedback loop. You've got to stop bringing me this crap.
Description.Name: Pirate L Pulse Laser

Description.Details: Gotta leave it to a pirate to fix a broken Chem Laser Autoloader by just wiring the ammo into the assembly with a old terran tubular magazine feed like a pump action shotgun. 10 rounds. VOLATILE!
Description.Name: M Chem Laser

Description.Details: Yeah Just when you believe they've sniffed the last Moonshine, one of them gets the idea to weld a bunch of Medium Chem Lasers together with half working RAC feeder.... Theres a cup welded in here.... Uses Chem Medium Ammo. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: M Chem Laser

Description.Details: Someone took this whole pulse idea very seriously.
Description.Name: M Pulse Laser

Description.Details: I am actually impressed, aside from it's misaligned focusing Lense and the Smell is this 'thing' in an excellent condition. Uses Chem Small Ammo. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: S Chem Laser

Description.Details: Captain, this piece is either from a genius or a moron. The Maniac put a filter on the output to essentially ''brand'' the target. Even worse they wrote a random generator to always 'paint' something else ... eff these punks!
Description.Name: TAGGER

Description.Details: This BattleMech features laser mounts of exceptional design and construction which leads to a marked increase in accuracy and reliability for such weapons.
Description.Name: Accurate Weapon - Laser

Description.Details: +1 Acc for Laser Weapons.
Description.Name: Laser Accuracy Quirk

Description.Details: The Rain Dancer Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) utilizes a series of micro pulse lasers to rapidly take down incoming missiles; unfortunately, this system runs incredibly hot and it heavily integrated into the chassis. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Laser Anti Missile System

Description.Details: This 'was' a Large Pulse Laser, and someone hotwired a TAG straight into the system, overloaded the capacitators and then managed to break the focusing system anyway.
Description.Name: Death Stare

Description.Details: Provides detailed information on enemy units
Description.Name: Advanced Sensors

Description.Details: Provides + 1 Initiative and several buffs.
Description.Name: Command Consoles

Description.Name: Command Consoles

Description.Details: Increases spotting distance by 25m.
Description.Name: SPOTTING DISTANCE INCREASED

Description.Details: IPSUM SUCKUM
Description.Name: ECM_Shield_Polly

Description.Details: Counter for the number of ECM emitters currently affecting an actor with shielding.
Description.Name: ECM Shield Emitter Count

Description.Details: Jamming ECM, reduces sensor checks for enemies in field
Description.Name: ECM Jammer

Description.Details: Counter for the number of ECM emitters currently affecting an actor with jamming.
Description.Name: ECM Jamming Emitter Count

Description.Details: Yeah, well so this is pretty much half of a Raven, its all there, Electronics Suite and even the whole Cockpit, so whoever drives it can shoot the still functioning Large X-Pulse Laser
Description.Name: Raven Turret

Description.Details: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
Description.Name: Active Probe (Passive)

Description.Details: Provides detailed information on enemy units
Description.Name: Advanced Sensors

Description.Details: +3 Turret mounted accuracy.
Description.Name: Turret Accuracy

Description.Details: Guardian ECM making this unit harder to hit.
Description.Name: GECM Interference

Description.Details: Active Null Signature Systems reduce visibility and grant Bulwark.
Description.Name: Null Signature Systems

Description.Details: Provides a +2 difficulty to hit bonus.
Description.Name: Active Stealth Armor

Description.Details: Increased Sight/Sensors
Description.Name: Bloodhound Probe

Description.Details: Increases spotting distance by 50m.
Description.Name: SPOTTING DISTANCE INCREASED

Description.Details: The RISC Hyper Laser is a experimental heavy laser derived from the Clan's Improved Heavy Laser family. Hyper Lasers are the ultimate development in the heavy lasers technology, but it was constructed by the RISC engineers, instead of the Clans. Thanks to the pushing the limits in laser shielding and plasma lasing chemistry, the Hyper Laser is a very destructive and extreme range weapon, but the thermal and physical stress of immense scale make this weapon very prone to explosive malfunction. VOLATILE! Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Hyper Laser

Description.Details: Developed by the Lyran Alliance, the Bombast Laser was designed to be the ultimate word in laser weapons. During the design process, its engineers had to reduce the weight of the weapon. This sacrifice came from the power supply, which made the weapon slow at charging. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Description.Name: Bombast Laser

Description.Details: Re-engineered Lasers were developed by trying to mate a Pulse laser with a Heavy Laser. Though unsuccessful in that effort the weapons created had one odd benefit: They totally ignored specialty anti-laser armors, inflicting their full damage on a unit equipped with such armor. The twin pulses fired by a Re-engineered Laser hit so close together on a target that they bore straight through.
Description.Name: L Laser

Description.Details: The Large Variable Speed Pulse Laser is the largest Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Weighing almost as much as a Heavy PPC, the Large VSP Laser can inflict nearly as much damage on a target, and has a better chance of hitting the target. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
Description.Name: L Pulse

Description.Details: X-Pulse Lasers are an attempt by Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of Pulse Lasers to compete with the longer ranges of standard models. X-Pulse lasers are not a new weapon per se, but an upgrade to Pulse Lasers that pushes extra energy through the system in order to extend the range.
Description.Name: L X-Pulse

Description.Details: Re-engineered Lasers were developed by trying to mate a Pulse laser with a Heavy Laser. Though unsuccessful in that effort the weapons created had one odd benefit: They totally ignored specialty anti-laser armors, inflicting their full damage on a unit equipped with such armor. The twin pulses fired by a Re-engineered Laser hit so close together on a target that they bore straight through.
Description.Name: M Laser

Description.Details: The Medium Variable Speed Pulse Laser is, as its name suggests, the mid-sized version of the Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
Description.Name: M Pulse

Description.Details: X-Pulse Lasers are an attempt by Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of Pulse Lasers to compete with the longer ranges of standard models. X-Pulse lasers are not a new weapon per se, but an upgrade to Pulse Lasers that pushes extra energy through the system in order to extend the range.
Description.Name: M X-Pulse

Description.Details: Re-engineered Lasers were developed by trying to mate a Pulse laser with a Heavy Laser. Though unsuccessful in that effort the weapons created had one odd benefit: They totally ignored specialty anti-laser armors, inflicting their full damage on a unit equipped with such armor. The twin pulses fired by a Re-engineered Laser hit so close together on a target that they bore straight through.
Description.Name: S Laser

Description.Details: The Small Variable Speed Pulse Laser is, as its name suggests, the smallest of the Variable Speed Lasers in use. Commonly fitted in place of a small pulse laser, this weapon is mostly seen on light 'Mechs. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
Description.Name: Small VSP Laser

Description.Details: X-Pulse Lasers are an attempt by Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of Pulse Lasers to compete with the longer ranges of standard models. X-Pulse lasers are not a new weapon per se, but an upgrade to Pulse Lasers that pushes extra energy through the system in order to extend the range.
Description.Name: S X-Pulse

Description.Details: Another recreation of Star League tech, this Target Acquisition Gear combines several active scanning systems to act like a Mech-sized laser pointer and share targeting information with the Lance. Two turn duration, does not stack.
Description.Name: TAG

Description.Details: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.
Description.Name: Target Acquired

Description.Details: TAG increases Visibility
Description.Name: Detected

Description.Details: Visual indicator of the TAG effect
Description.Name: TAG MARKED

Description.Details: A Laser Pistol? Ive only read about these in old tech manuals. You See how they Wired a Chemical Laser to be fired just like your typical SideArm? This is Genius! 30 rounds.
Description.Name: HH S Chem Laser
